item.title: How to npc drops (i am good coder so its easy to explain)
item.dc:creator: @andrew1234321 andrew1234321
item.description:
@andrew1234321 wrote:

go to your npchandler.java, search for JAD or osmething like that
add

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ~npcidhere~) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomMonster(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

then open item2.java

search for the same thing, add this under

[code]
public static int Monster[] = {item ids here};

public static int randomMonster()
{
	return Monster[(int)(Math.random()*Monster.length)];
}	[/code]

Read full topic
